intermediateVariable.name: TOTAL NUMBER OF EQUIPEMENTS AT A FACILITY
intermediateVariable.executableScript: select equ.code from Equipment as equ where (equ.currentStatus='OPERATIONAL' or equ.currentStatus='UNDERMAINTENANCE' or equ.currentStatus='PARTIALLYOPERATIONAL') and equ.dataLocation=locationidentifier

intermediateVariable.name: TOTAL NUMBER OF SPARE PARTS AT A FACILITY
intermediateVariable.executableScript: select sp.code from SparePart as sp

intermediateVariable.name: TOTAL NUMBER WORK ORDERS AT A FACILITY
intermediateVariable.executableScript: select wo.id from WorkOrder as wo
